question: Roger amna 5i balu tenis. mu njëndaat yeneen 2i boyetu balu tenis. boyet bu ne amna 3i balu tenis. Ñaata balu tenis la am léegi?

Amoon na juroom ñenti nosukaay ci néegu jokkalante gi. juroomi nosukaay yeneen lanuy fa sàmp bés bu jot  ci digànte,altine ba alxamis. Ñaata nosukaay moo àm jamono yi si néegu jokkalanteey nosukaay yi?
Léa amoon na 32i sokola rakkam bu jigéen am 42. bu fekke ni da ñoo lekk 32i yi. Ñaata xaajitu sokola moo leen dese?
Shawn amna juroomi fowukaay. Si béssub Noël bi mu jott ñaari fowukaay si pappam ak ñaar si yaayam. Ñaata fowukaay la àm léegi?
Michael amoon na 58i balu golf. Talaata mu ñakk 23i balu golf. àllarba mu ñakkaat yeneen 2 yu tegu ci limu ñàkkoon. Ñaata balu golf la amoon si njéxitalu bésu àllarba bi?
Olivia amna 23$. Mu jënd jutoomi bagels si njëgu 3$ benn bu ne. Ñaata la dese si xaalis?
Jason amoon na 20i tàngal macc. Mu jox ay tangal macc Dany. Jason amna léegi 12i tangal macc. Ñaata tangal macc la jox Dany?
Bu fekke ni fa nuy denc daamar yi amna 3i daamar, ba noppi yeneen 2i daamar  ñëw,  ñaata daamar ñoo nekk sa fanuy denc daamar yi?
